backend/main.mo: Motoko canister implementing user profile access with authorization checks and an inquiry system with admin-restricted retrieval.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing required UI copy changes and files impacted by two content-related features.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file containing prewritten summaries of various frontend components, pages, and hooks.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base stylesheet defining OKLCH color variables for light/dark themes and global element styles.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry file mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router with public routes and admin-protected inquiry management routes using AdminGuard.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminGuard: Component that restricts access to admin-only areas based on Internet Identity authentication and user role.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Login/logout button integrating Internet Identity authentication with query cache clearing on logout.
frontend/src/components/inquiry/InquiryF: User inquiry form with validation, consent check, submission handling, and success/error states.
frontend/src/components/inquiry/inquiryM: Formats inquiry form data into subject/body text and assigns MessageType.inquiry for backend submission.
Renders the site footer with company info, quick links, contact details, and a copyright section with branding.
Provides a responsive site header with navigation links, logo, login button, and a mobile menu using a sheet drawer.
Defines the main site layout wrapper including header, footer, and a flexible content area.
frontend/src/components/site/ThemeCard.t: Reusable card component that displays optional title and description with styled content.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages the backend actor instance based on Internet Identity, refreshing dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements an authentication context using Internet Identity, managing login, logout, and stored identities.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Contains React Query hooks for user profiles, roles, and inquiries, using the actor to interact with the backend.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles with custom industrial-themed CSS variables and utility patterns for light and dark modes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes the React app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider, then renders the root component.
frontend/src/pages/AboutPage.tsx: Displays the About page with sections for mission, values, and company information using themed cards and icons.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminInquiriesP: Admin view listing all submitted inquiries with loading and error states. Supports navigation to individual inquiry details.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminInquiryDet: Shows detailed information for a single inquiry including metadata and message body. Includes navigation back to the inquiries list.
frontend/src/pages/ContactPage.tsx: Renders the contact page with company contact details and an inquiry form. Uses ThemeCard and InquiryForm components.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Provides the homepage layout with a hero section, feature highlights, and links to key pages. Emphasizes aluminum can trading services.
frontend/src/pages/TradingPage.tsx: Displays trading offerings including material types and a step-by-step explanation of the trading process. Uses ThemeCard components for each material category.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading URL parameters, storing them in sessionStorage, and managing persisted values. Supports both query string and hash-based routing.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration enabling dark mode, scanning frontend files, extending theme colors, fonts, animations, and adding plugins like typography, container queries, and animate.
project_state.json: JSON describing the project's current feature set, versions, and summaries for an ICP canister-based web app with frontend and backend capabilities.
